revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_CorpseExplode}} '''A_CorpseExplode'''
(no parameters) Spawns between four and seven {{Class|CorpseBit}} actors, all with random horizontal velocities between -4 and +4 on both X and Y axes, and a random vertical velocity between 3.75 and 9. One of the corpse bits will be put in its Spawn+3 state (corresponding normally to the corpse's head), the rest are randomly put in Spawn, Spawn+1 or Spawn+2. The function then plays the calling actor's {{Property|DeathSound|death sound}}, and destroys it, so any state after a call to this function will never be run. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ZCorpseSitting}} and derived classes. {{DEFAULTSORT:CorpseExplode}} [[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Spawn functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]
